title: ISlicingData.SetBoundingBoxDirection2
description: Sets bounding box direction 2 (right manipulator for linear slicing, bottom manipulator for radial slicing).

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description: For linear slicing: 0.0 < right manipulator < 500.0 For radial slicing: -500.0 < bottom manipulator < 0.0 (see Remarks )

returns: True if direction 2 of bounding box successfully set, false if not
remarks:
Use these methods to adjust the slicing volume to include or exclude geometry for slicing:
ISlicingData::SetBoundingBoxDirection1
ISlicingData::SetBoundingBoxDirection2
ISlicingData::SetBoundingBoxDirection3
ISlicingData::SetBoundingBoxDirection4
This method fails when:
Direction exceeds the specified limits.
The bounding box cannot be created because
ISlicingData::PlaneReferences
has not been set.
